citation_details.title: Prior knowledge changes initial sensory processing in the human spinal cord
citation_details.author: MP Stenner, CM Nossa, T Zaehle, E Azañón
citation_details.abstract: Prior knowledge changes how the brain processes sensory input. Whether knowledge  influences initial sensory processing upstream of the brain, in the spinal cord, is unknown.
citation_details.short_author: MP Stenner, CM Nossa, T Zaehle, E Azañón
citation_details.publisher: American Association for the Advancement of Science
